senses.ex: If you have any questions, feel free to call in and ask.

Tips.title: Requesting Action
Tips.description: Used to ask for help or information over the phone.
Tips.example: If you're lost, call in to the station for directions.

Tips.title: Radio Programs
Tips.description: Listeners often call in to participate in radio shows or contests.
Tips.example: Listeners can call in now to win tickets!

senses.de: To ask a person to come somewhere, typically a workplace
senses.ex: They had to call in a specialist to fix the problem.

Tips.title: Professional Needs
Tips.description: Expresses the need to bring an external expert for a specific issue.
Tips.example: Our network is down; we need to call in an IT technician.

Tips.title: Urgency Implied
Tips.description: Often indicates a situation is urgent or beyond internal capabilities.
Tips.example: The flood damage was severe, so we had to call in a crisis team.

senses.ex: He decided to call in on his way home.

Tips.title: Short Visit
Tips.description: Suggests a brief and informal visit to a place or person.
Tips.example: I'll call in at your house after work for a quick chat.

Tips.title: No Need to Stay
Tips.description: You don't have to stay long when you 'call in' somewhere.
Tips.example: Just call in to pick up the book; I won't keep you.

senses.de: To get people to do a job
senses.ex: They had to call in the army to control the situation.

Tips.title: Last Resort
Tips.description: Used when all other options have been exhausted or are unavailable.
Tips.example: When negotiations failed, they had to call in the mediators.

Tips.title: Authority Required
Tips.description: When someone calling in has the authority to demand action or help.
Tips.example: With protests escalating, the governor called in the National Guard.

senses.de: To communicate an order to stop or withdraw, often a promise or offer
senses.ex: They had to call in the offer after the product was recalled.

Tips.title: Withdrawal Notice
Tips.description: Indicates taking back an offer or demand previously made.
Tips.example: Due to budget cuts, we have to call in the discount offer.

Tips.title: Claiming Debts
Tips.description: Used by lenders when they require immediate repayment of loans.
Tips.example: The bank called in the loan after the business went bankrupt.
